virtual ~GridView ()

Detailed Description

A grid-view describes the view of the widget grid.

Draws the grid.

Implements View.

void GridView::DrawCell (  const GridModel &  model,
DeviceContext *  dc,
const Cell &  cell,
BOOLEAN  highlighted = FALSE
)  const [virtual]
 

Draws the cell with the position cell of the grid. By default the parameter highlighted has no results to the look of the cell, but it can be used by derived views for specialised drawing.
